        foo() {
            for (let x of [0]) {

                let f = function() { return x; };
                this.bar(f());
            }
        }
        bar(a: number) {
        }
    
        baz() {
            for (let x of [1]) {
                let a = function() {  return x; };
                for (let y of [1]) {
                    let b = function() { return y; };
                    this.bar(b());
                }
                this.bar(a());
            }
        }
        baz2() {
            for (let x of [1]) {
                let a = function() {  return x; };
                this.bar(a());
                for (let y of [1]) {
                    let b = function() { return y; };
                    this.bar(b());
                }
            }
        }
    }
    
    class B {
        foo() {
            let a =
                () => {
                    for (let x of [0]) {
                        let f = () => x;
                        this.bar(f());
                    }

        }
